subtitle: Quick and easy, this is a tasty and satisfying light lunch.

method.text: Using a fork, flake the tuna into a small saucepan. Add the soup to the pan with the milk. Slowly bring to the boil, stirring constantly.
Using a round-bladed knife, roughly chop the egg. Add to the pan with the peas. Mix together then simmer for 3-5 min, stirring frequently until hot.
Meanwhile, carefully cut the muffins in half. Place in a toaster and toast for 2-3 min until golden brown.
Divide the tuna mixture between the muffins. Crush the crisps slightly then use to top the muffins.
Serve immediately with a little lettuce and tomato.

title: Crunchy topped tuna muffins
